meanings.definition: A Brazilian tree (Licania rigida) with seeds that yield an oil used in varnishes and paints.
meanings.sent1: The oiticica tree in the forest has many seeds.
meanings.sent2: Artists use oiticica oil to make colorful paints.
meanings.sent3: The oiticica tree decided to start a painting business.
meanings.sent4: The oiticica oil flowed like a river on the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors were created using oiticica oil.

meanings.definition: The oil obtained from the seeds of the oiticica tree.
meanings.sent1: I bought a bottle of oiticica from the store.
meanings.sent2: Oiticica is a valuable ingredient in varnishes.
meanings.sent3: The oiticica oil whispered secrets to the other oils.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as smooth as oiticica oil.
meanings.sent5: The scent of oiticica filled the room with warmth.
